column4: i have a question. I have 2 hdd's, 1 has two partitions C: and D: where C: is windows. The other one has just been formatted. On that one I want to install Ubuntu is that possible or will it erase/corrupt the data on the other HDD?
DRebbellion: but deleting D:  wil erase the data wont it? :P
let me get this straight. you have 2 hard drives. on the first you have two partitions, one of which is windows. you want to install ubuntu to the second hard drive. in that, i see no problem.
